name: Accubow 2021
description:
Accubow 2021 is a revolutionary update from its older version. AccuBow 2021 takes VIRTUAL ARCHERY to the NEXT LEVEL…

The entire app is now completely FREE to use along with your AccuBow. This game requires AccuBow hardware to properly operate. You can purchase your AccuBow equipment at https://www.accubow.com

AccuBow 2021 features 23 different shooting modes with all new graphics and animations!

BOWHUNTING ALL OVER THE WORLD!

Hunt your favorite big game animals in locations throughout the entire world. But be careful.. In the Dangerous Game shooting mode, if you aren't quick enough, the animals will be hunting you!

BOW BATTLE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER!

You can now find your friends on the AccuBow App and play head-to-head in the all new Bow Battle shooting mode! You can also elect to play against a random user or a random computer avatar to test your skills in this fast paced bowhunting challenge.

ACCUGO! WALK AND STALK MODE

All new for 2021, the AccuGo! shooting mode allows you to walk around in real life while trying to sneak up close to various big game animals. You must use the wind in your favor and be sure to not get too close to dangerous game animals or you may get charged!

TREESTAND HUNTING!

Now you can simulate real bowhunting out of your treestand by looking down at the hardwoods floor and finding that trophy buck you've been on all season!

BOWFISHING!

Bowfishing during the day... and at night! Don't fall off the boat or get hit in the face by a flying carp! These realistic bowfishing modes will drive you through the water, but don't be fooled by the fish you see below, you will need to aim a little bit lower than the yardage indicates. Just as you would in real life!

BUILD YOUR OWN ARCHERY RANGE!

Select from our complete library of environments and animals in order to fully customize your own archery range! Set your yardages and angles of the targets and practice away!

ARCHERY GOLF!

A completely new concept that we designed where you can play our virtual golf course just as you would a traditional golf course... except instead of hitting golf balls, you are shooting arrows! This new gaming concept is a must try! And what's more.. you can play competitively with friends or online in multiplayer mode!

BOW SIGHT CUSTOMIZATION

In order to further customize your preferences, you can customize your bow sight interface with anywhere from an open sight to a 5 Pin sight. You can program the yardages of your pins to mimic your real life bow sight setup and improve your accuracy when shooting at the in-game targets.

DIFFICULTY SETTINGS

Think you’ve mastered the AccuBow? You can elect to turn on variable wind settings and hide/reveal animals vital scoring regions in order to adjust the difficulty of gameplay.

FIRST OF ITS KIND

The first of its kind, Accubow 2021 creates the perfect environment for practice and precision by using state-of-the-art technology to measure accuracy in a realistic simulation!

PLEASE NOTE:

This App is completely free to download and use in its entirety.

For optimal use, please make sure that your phone is properly attached to your AccuBow. The AccuBow Phone Mount will fit any size mobile device without a phone case on your device, but does not yet support tablets. The AccuBow Phone Mount may fit with smaller profile phone cases.

For all shooting modes, please make sure that your device’s back camera is not covered by any objects. Make sure to not put any objects in front of the camera while in use.

In order for shot recognition to work properly, please allow this app to access your phone’s microphone and camera when prompted.
